documentation.text:
@notice Supplies the inflation rate for LPs per unit of time (seconds).
 @return LP inflation rate.

@notice Supplies the inflation rate for keepers per unit of time (seconds).
 @return keeper inflation rate.

@notice Supplies the inflation rate for LPs on AMMs per unit of time (seconds).
 @return AMM inflation rate.

executeInflationRateUpdate().details: This updates the inflation rate to the next linear segment in the inflations schedule.
executeInflationRateUpdate().notice: Update the inflation rate according to the piecewise linear schedule.

getAmmInflationRate().notice: Supplies the inflation rate for LPs on AMMs per unit of time (seconds).

getKeeperInflationRate().notice: Supplies the inflation rate for keepers per unit of time (seconds).

getLpInflationRate().notice: Supplies the inflation rate for LPs per unit of time (seconds).

mint(address,uint256).details: Can only be called by the controller.
mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints MERO tokens to a specified address.

mintNonInflationTokens(address,uint256).details: The amount of tokens that can be minted in total is subject to a pre-set upper limit.
mintNonInflationTokens(address,uint256).notice: Mint tokens that are not part of the inflation schedule.
